text: Paphiopedilum adductum is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to Mindanao Island of the Philippines. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss and overcollection. == Sources == Category:Flora of Mindanao Category:Endemic orchids of the Philippines adductum Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Paphiopedilum adductum
